summary: This bill, the "Medically Tailored Home-Delivered Meals Program Pilot Act," amends title XVIII of the Social Security Act to establish a pilot program under Medicare Part A. This program will provide medically tailored home-delivered meals to qualified individuals to improve health outcomes and reduce hospital readmissions. Selected hospitals will be chosen to participate, providing meals, medical nutrition therapy, screening, and data reporting. The program will be funded from the Hospital Insurance Trust Fund and evaluated for its effectiveness.
